map.[hota] marsh.header.name: Moèál
map.[hota] mysterious ways.header.descri: This small realm lives by its own rules. Everything here is subject to change in a snap of fingers. New paths appear in the woods, waiting for an adventurer to set foot upon them. You will have to blaze your own way to triumph.
map.[hota] mysterious ways.header.name: Mysterious Ways
map.[hota] mysterious ways.quest.16.17.0: Ach, koneènì nìkdo, kdo tøímá modrý prapor. Mám zde pro tebe odmìnu. Pøijmeš ji?
Èekám zde na hrdinu, který tøímá modrý prapor.
Ty netøímáš modrý prapor! Kliï se odtud.
map.[hota] perfect equality.header.descr: The plot is as old as the world – a dying king told four sons to find a worthy successor in a fair fight. The kingdom is great, and the king was able to give a fair piece of land to every son, so that there would be no unfair advantage.
map.[hota] perfect equality.header.name: Perfect Equality
The old man looks excited and proud of you. He grants you his knowledge.

You come to a small dwelling, built directly within an old but still quite mighty tree. In the bottom window a dim light was burning – apparently a candlestick was the only way to illuminate the house. While you were gathering your thoughts whether to come and knock on the door or not, it opened by itself and an old man stepped outside.

An old warrior lives here. He will be ready to teach you some tricks, but you must be worthy. Return when you have at least 32 attack and 14 defense.
The old man refuses to speak until you are strong enough.
You are potent enough, and the mage grants you some of his power.
You notice a small house on the outskirts of the forest. You decide to check what’s inside. You meet a mage, who is willing to grant you great power for 32 power and 14 knowledge.
You try to open the door again, but you see the 32 and 14 numbers appearing on it. You walk away.
You are approaching the house, knowing that you are ready. Inside, a man welcomes you. He offers his powers to train you in the arts of defense.

A few steps from the house, an arrow hits the ground under your legs.

"Protection - 32 points and attack - 14 points. Don’t dare to come closer without these stats."
You avoid the small house, as you know you are not yet prepared.
You come in the library, and are finally able to understand what the books are about. You learn a lot in your short time here.

You enter a small house, which appears to be a library. You randomly take a book from the shelf, but fail to understand the strange writings in it. Perhaps, possession of 32 knowledge and 14 power will grant you the knowledge of these pages.
You know that at the current time the library is a waste of time. You need more knowledge and power.
map.[hota] pirate's utopia.guards.12.138: Pøímo pøed tebou se nachází legendární ledový palác. Pøed dávnými vìky v nìm žil jakýsi princ, který se zøekl lásky samotné Bohynì zimy. map.[hota] pirate's utopia.guards.40.143: Tvý družiníci vážnì uvažují nad tím, že se vzbouøí.
map.[hota] pirate's utopia.guards.93.143: Tví vojáci si myslí, že se jsi pøišel o rozum.
map.[hota] pirate's utopia.header.descri: Na jednom ze zdejších ostrovù je údajnì ukryt pirátský poklad. Tak na co èekáš? Najdi ho!
map.[hota] pirate's utopia.header.name: Pirátský sen
Slyšel jsem, že na zdejších ostrovech pøebývá spoustu poustevníkù, kteøí sem odešli do ústraní.
Znáš ten pøekrásný pøíbìh o tom, kterak se sama zima zamilovala do neznámého prince? Podle povìsti je onen princ vìznìn v ledovém království daleko na jihu.
map.[hota] pirate's utopia.heroes.147.bi: Kdysi býval vìznìm Bohynì zimy. Nyní za svou svobodu vdìèí udatnému hrdinovi.

Cesta do Sféry vzduchu je uzavøena. Ale tøeba se ti jí podaøí najít.
map.[hota] province.event.0.description: These scarce lands are ravaged by war, and will not allow you to keep a large army. It is better to wait for your opponents to weaken each other, and then take a chance at delivering a final blow.
map.[hota] province.header.description: Scarce on resources, a small province was knee-deep at war between four lords. The land is barren and has no value to it, however not a single side will step back. It is a matter of principle now probably.
map.[hota] province.header.name: Province
map.[hota] scorched earth.event.0.descri:
The once fertile land lies in ruins. Mines collapsed after an eruption on the island. Our only hope lies in the warehouses. The goods accumulated there will help to recover our strength.
The trouble, as always, does not come alone: what was not destroyed by lava, was pillaged by pirates and vultures. Besides, the lord you struggled with for years decided to strike at your weakened army, hoping to seize the entire island. Negotiation is not an option. You must prepare for the battle.
map.[hota] scorched earth.event.1.descri: Surviving workers were able to somewhat clear up the rubble. Some of the extracted resources were recovered.
map.[hota] scorched earth.event.2.descri: Remaining money was spent on paying thieves to man your distant garrison. Perhaps they will save us the hassle of unexpected guests for some time.
map.[hota] scorched earth.event.3.descri: Rumor has it that some mines in the dungeons could have survived.
map.[hota] scorched earth.guards.35.34.0:
As if it was not enough for pirates to plunder the island, they have also taken over the remains of a village.

It’s not the best idea to set a camp near the erupting volcano, but these guys seem to care little.
map.[hota] scorched earth.header.descrip: An eruption of a volcano forces you to halt extraction of resources on the island. The mines collapsed, burned down or were flooded with boiling lava. The only remaining source of supplies is the warehouses. Apparently, a neighboring lord is keeping an eye on them as well.
map.[hota] scorched earth.header.name: Scorched Earth
Výbornì! Pøesnì takové aspidy král žádal. Nech nám je tu a my tì necháme projít.
Král si žádá tøi aspidy. Abychom mu je pøivedli, musíme se po nich poohlédnout vnì království. Pøiveï nám je a my tì pustíme dál.
Je mi líto, ale dokud nám nepøivedeš tøi aspidy, neznám bratra.
map.[hota] scorched earth.sign.67.27.0.m: You fished a bottle out of the water, but you found nothing more than some excellent rum inside. This one's to the pirate who lost it!
map.[hota] strait of storms - invasion.e: You became aware that planeswalkers did not come alone. They hired orcs, goblins, and other foreigners, so that they do all the dirty work for them.
map.[hota] strait of storms - invasion.h: Precarious peace in the strait was broken by invasion of Elemental Lords. They have created a portal in the heart of the sea. And even though you have strengthened the approaches to the monolith, the enemy did not retreat.
map.[hota] strait of storms - invasion.q: Já vìdìl, že na tebe bude spolehnutí. Je vidìt, žes bìhem svých dobrodružství pochytil spoustu zkušeností. Bude mi neskonalou ctí se s tebou podìlit o svá vìdìní, máš-li o nì zájem.
Jsem starý a moudrý a nepustím do svého pøíbytku jen tak ledaskoho. Dokud nedosáhneš 6. úrovnì, nemáme se spolu o èem bavit.
Pchá! To jsi zase ty? Jak jsem øíkal, dokud nedosáhneš 6. úrovnì, nemáme se spolu o èem bavit.
Ach, to je pøesnì to, co potøebuji! Zde je tvá slibovaná odmìna. Ještì poøád chceš ten Pøívìsek života vymìnit?

Kdysi dávno ovládali mocní mudrcové øemeslo výroby artefaktù, avšak postupem èasu se na toto umìní zapomnìlo. Já se nyní hodlám jejich vìdìní nauèit a navázat, kde skonèili, jenže k tomu potøebuji nìjaký artefakt. Pokud bys mi pøinesl, øeknìme, Pøívìsek života, štìdøe bych se ti odmìnil.
Poøád nic? To nevadí, jsem si jist, že Pøívìsek života nakonec najdeš. Kdo hledá, najde.
Koneènì jsou ti zatracení minotauøi minulostí a zdejší kraj je opìt bezpeèný! Pøijmeš na oplátku mou odmìnu?
Zdejší kraj sužují minotauøi, kteøí se zdržují východnì odtud. Pokud bys je odtud dokázal vyhnat, byl bych ti navìky zavázán.
Nevìs hlavu. Porazit minotaury není žádná hraèka. Jsem si však jist, že se ti to nakonec podaøí.
Stráže si povšimly, že jsi zkušeným hrdinou, a proto nemají sebemenší problém pustit tì dál. Pøeješ si nyní projít?
Území za touto vìží je zrádné a stráže tam nepustí nikoho, kdo dosud nedosáhl 5. úrovnì.
Stráže zkrátka odmítají pustit kohokoli, kdo dosud nedosáhl 5. úrovnì.

map.[hota] strait of storms - skirmish.h: Strait of Storms is a strategically important point on this land. Supersede a competitor from the other side and get full control over the strait!
map.[hota] strait of storms - skirmish.q: Ach, to je pøesnì to, co potøebuji! Zde je tvá slibovaná odmìna. Ještì poøád chceš ten Pøívìsek života vymìnit?

Kdysi dávno ovládali mocní mudrcové øemeslo výroby artefaktù, avšak postupem èasu se na toto umìní zapomnìlo. Já se nyní hodlám jejich vìdìní nauèit a navázat, kde skonèili, jenže k tomu potøebuji nìjaký artefakt. Pokud bys mi pøinesl, øeknìme, Pøívìsek života, štìdøe bych se ti odmìnil.

map.[hota] talent shortage.event.0.descr: Mullich was even madder than usual. The fleeing soldiers took everything they could carry. There was no one left in the castle. Valets, stableboys, blacksmiths, the century-old housekeeper, just about everyone legged it. The only one to stay was David the squire, whom Mullich ordered to tie to a pole the day before after the guy stole a ham from the master pantry. The kid was in for a rotten string of days, as Mullich would definitely be taking it all out on him.
map.[hota] talent shortage.guards.1.35.0: Tribulations of the day gave Mullich some new knowledge.
Tribulations of the day gave Mullich some new knowledge.
Oh look, aren't these Mullich's former squad? It didn't take long for them to hit the skids without proper leadership, and it seems they're hopeful to recoup their losses out of their former commander.
Tribulations of the day gave Mullich some new knowledge.
Tribulations of the day gave Mullich some new knowledge.
Tribulations of the day gave Mullich some new knowledge.
map.[hota] talent shortage.guards.33.5.0: A charge of lightning made Mullich's hair stand up. He feels some new knowledge boiling under his skull.
In hindsight, it was silly to hope no one would jump out of a sea of flames like this one. Well, lo and behold.
Tribulations of the day gave Mullich some new knowledge.
map.[hota] talent shortage.guards.37.5.0: Tribulations of the day gave Mullich some new knowledge.
This shrine is guarded after all! To arms!!!
map.[hota] talent shortage.guards.46.2.0: Tribulations of the day gave Mullich some new knowledge.
Just as Mullich thought that was about enough Undead business for tonight...
A thief who Mullich caught feeling around his empty purse was forced to pledge himself to the knight's cause; the only other option was to be executed immediately.
map.[hota] talent shortage.guards.9.53.0: Oh, cute! These dragons are having a date here. Shame they really don't like attention.
map.[hota] talent shortage.header.descri: Sir Mullich's act got old. The morning after the infamous knight had another violent ourburst, he woke up to an empty castle. His people packed up and left in the thick of the night, just as Mullich was given a pest control mission in the royal countryhouse...
map.[hota] talent shortage.header.name: Talent Shortage
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.10.44.0: Here's your new equipment, please sign here. This also means you're to report immediately if a crusade is launched.
Come join our refitting program! We offer lighter swords, sturdier armor and nicer buc... helmets!
We won't issue armament to some random scrub. Bring an experienced swordsman.
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.11.52.0: Step right up, here's your new vestment. Just try to abstain from hurling bolts indoors, will you?
Fashionable blue cassocks and powered-up bolts! For distinguished clergy only.
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.12.34.0: Did you get it all? Oh great, dump it all here! You must be exhausted to carry such a pile of surplus gear.
We can take useless scrap off your hands. Well, you might call it useless, but we hope to repurpose it nicely Here's what we're after.
A helmet, a shield, a breastplate, and a sash. Would you like me to write you a list?
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.15.33.1: At last! Here, take my bow and my armor, and get that prince bastard an arrow in the belly for me if you ever happen to meet him!
I was banished into the underworld many years ago, after defeating the prince in an archery contest. I was really good, and I'd like to pass what remained of my talent onto a younger elf.
Hurry up, bring me an elf! I'm not going to last forever!
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.17.26.0: Shall we get on with the retraining?
Gee, you finally decided to give your men something more impressive than sticks and hatchets? You've come to the right place then...
Hand over the crystals, and begone. I myself am getting tired of slacking here.
Admittance will set you back 10 crystals, no less.
You don't have 10 crystals to spare? For shame! And you dare call yourself a knight!
Ready to get your hands dirty, kid?
If you want to up your shooting rate, you'll have to put in twice as much work...
I hope your elf doesn't mind partaking in my experiment. Thing is... it has a rather unusual side-effect.

I believe I've found a way to bless men who don't have innate magical abilities. I want to carry out and experiment, but I'm afraid I'm lacking a suitable subject. Do you happen to have an elf to spare? I won't break him, I promise!
An elf! I need an elf!
I heard from a wise man that a certain drawstring, severed from its bow, helps you shoot way better!
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.34.60.0: Here's our girl! Are you ready to get promoted?
Are you wondering how our tree stands unscathed in a sea of flames? Well, we're masters of the element of water, and fire can't touch us. Would you like to learn this trick? Then bring us a witch.
Only a witch can master our complicated magicks.
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.35.32.1: Would you like to learn to march fast?
You can learn to march double time here.
You can learn to march double time here. Choose wisely!
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.36.28.1: Would you like to learn to shoot well?
You can learn to shoot with great accuracy here.
You can learn to shoot with great accuracy here. Choose wisely!
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.40.45.0: Oh, bless you! My collection is complete now! Would you like to pass?
I'm a collector interested in rarities crafted in the "graveyard Empire" style. I heard there are several things like that to be found in around these parts. Would you mind bringing them to me?
Skulls, bones, decay and despair. That's what I'm looking for.
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.44.22.0: Hey, it's me again. I'll take 10 gems this time.
You don't have 10 gems to spare? For shame! And you dare call yourself a knight!
Here it is! Shall we trade?
A Centaur's Axe? What do you need this hunk of iron for? Hand it over, and I'll give you something nice in return.
It's an axe. Big and rather unwieldy. Get it to me.
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.45.44.0: Here's a nice cassock for our new brother!
We are a militant order. Would your crusader be interested to join?
Is there no one willing to take the monastic path?
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.51.10.0: Shall we start our sword practice?
Your shooters may convert into heavy infantry here.
No shooters in your army? What kind of an army it even is?!
Did you know your rogue was an elf? We'll set him up with a bow, he'll do good with it.
We help former reprobates reform and find a righteous path in life. If you encounter one, bring him here.
map.[hota] talent shortage.quest.59.16.0: Hand over the ring, and I'll give your guys a nice drill.
Would you like to know the secret to be naturally sturdy? You won't even need this ring anymore, which I'm going to claim as my payment...
Ring of Vitality. It's a pretty gold trinket. Carry on with your search.
You may learn to shoot well or to march fast here, but not both.
map.[hota] terra incognita.guards.7.15.1: Undoubtedly, this tunnel should lead to the place where the town is!
map.[hota] terra incognita.header.descri: You managed to get a very old map. It marked a town filled with untold riches... Eliminate the competition and get to the treasure first!
map.[hota] terra incognita.header.name: Terra Incognita
You face the Tomb entrance. Zombies raise and launch an attack.
map.[hota] the alliance.header.descripti: An earth-shaking war between West and East is underway. You and your allies must destroy the enemy at all costs.
map.[hota] the alliance.header.name: The Alliance
map.[hota] the alliance.monster.105.58.1: Welcome to my labyrinth! It's going to take a big portion of your life!
map.[hota] the alliance.monster.106.58.1: Vítej v mém labyrintu! Odtud se živý nevymotáš, na to dej krk!
You must defeat us before you can save the prisoner.
Chceš-li zachránit zajatce, musíš si to nejprve rozdat s námi!
Have a taste of my mighty axe!
You can kiss my hairy BUTT!!
map.[hota] the alliance.quest.37.115.1.c: Wow! That's exactly what I needed. As I've said before, there are many creatures in my zoo. Among those are Faerie Dragons. They breed very well, and I can give you a few in exchange for one Crystal Dragon.
map.[hota] the alliance.quest.37.115.1.f: I'm collecting unique animals for my zoo. I've got many different creatures, but still I don't have Crystal Dragons. There is a dwelling of those north from here. Get me one, and I will reward you.
map.[hota] the devil is in the detail.ev: This land has served your kindgom well and will provide enough resources to expand your borders. The old prophet used to say: "Southern regions are rich, but also dangerous".
This land has served your kindgom well and will provide enough resources to expand your borders. The old prophet used to say: Northern regions are rich, but also dangerous".
Old prophet told you of the mythical island that is believed to be the centre of everything. Centuries ago it was an arena where gods fought. It's supposed to be full of treasure.
The old prophet told you a story about an ancient passage that collapsed centuries ago. Rumors say that evil forces have built a portal to get out from underground.
An old miner told you about an accident his team had in one of your mines. When digging too deep, a pack of troglodytes attacked them. Seems as evil creatures are already lurking underground.
The legions of hell are countless. Your scouts report they have never seen so many demons coming out of hell.
There is an ancient shrine on the central island. Some say the runes can be found there from which one can learn to teleport between different locations!
map.[hota] the devil is in the detail.he: During last centuries this land has been divided between six nations coexisting in peace. As rumours about underground monsters began spreading, it became obvious the world wouldn't remain like that for long.
The Devil is in the Detail
map.[hota] the devil is in the detail.qu: Finally! Here, give me the Gold and watch it grow before your eyes!
Welcome to the Gold brothers merchant bank! We offer great returns if you're willing to invest.
Oh my, that's simply not enough. We need 10000 Gold. I won't earn a cent if you bring less!
Finally! Here, give me the Gold and watch it grow before your eyes!
Welcome to the Gold brothers merchant bank! We offer great returns if you're willing to invest.
Oh my, that's simply not enough. We need 10000 Gold. I won't earn a cent if you bring less!
At last, my family all together again! Please close your eyes, I'll teach you some real magic!
My family has been wiped out many years ago by an evil necromancer. Bring my family back to me and I'll teach you the most powerful magic, the "Resurrection" spell!
No luck finding my ancestors?

Welcome to the most famous tavern on these waters! Many travelers and merchants visit us. The last one hadn't been too polite, and we made him leave something behind for all the mess he made! If you give me some gold, I'll happily pass it on to you.
What I have is for Dracon alone. I shall give it to no other. He has been imprisoned, but I promised to keep his share!
What I have is for Kilgor alone. I shall give it to no other. He has been imprisoned, but I promised to keep his share!
Liches are menacing the southwestern region of this land.  If you could be so bold as to defeat them, I would teach you the "Summon Boat" spell.
Finally, the 500 Peasants and 8 Boars that'll save my company! Here are some of those useless monsters!

Times are getting hard underground... But if I had more manpower, I would yet grow my business! Can you help me bring more men to work? I'll happily give you some of these lazy monsters that live around!
No luck in finding the 500 Peasants and 8 Boars? Please hurry, I need help with my business!

Finally!  Here, give the 10000 Gold to me and see how it grows!.

Oh my, that's simply not enough.  I need 10000 Gold.  I'll not earn a cent if you bring less!

I am researching a way to create the ultimate war machine, but I am short of materials for my workshop.  If you could bring me 20 Wood, 20 Mercury, 20 Ore, 20 Sulfur, 20 Crystal, 20 Gems and 10000 Gold, I would be most grateful.

The dead rise from their graves and attack!
map.[hota] the great wasteland.header.de: Back in the day, these lands had been bustling with life and prospering, before an experiment of a mad alchemist gone awry turned them into a charred wasteland. The lords who survived the calamity aim to take over this place, odd-looking but still full of treasure. You must act immediately to beat t
map.[hota] the great wasteland.monster.3: May the Light guide you on your path!
map.[hota] the great wasteland.sign.18.6: Here lives a famous card magician, also a sorcerer and a conjurer!
map.[hota] the great wasteland.sign.49.1: Why would you even want this bottle? There's nothing in it. Well, since you're here anyway, let me tell you the Grail's in the underworld.
map.[hota] trial of flame.event.0.descri:
Jmenuji se Manfred a jsem jedním z nejlepších ohnivých mágù. Tedy aspoò se o to pokouším. Pocházím z koèovného kmene, který v podstatì nikde není doma. Abych se mohl vìnovat magii, musel jsem svùj kmen opustit.

Mùj lid po léta vypravuje báji o Pouštní výhni, krajinì, kam ještì nikdy žádná noha smrtelníka nevkroèila. map.[hota] with sword and fire.event.0.d: You have no gold or resources.
map.[hota] with sword and fire.header.de: There comes a day when even a ranger as legendary as Kyrre can't find her way out of the forest maze.
